item.title: using hatch for application development
item.description: THIS IS STILL A DRAFT Certain sections of prose are incomplete; code is somewhat complete, but will be revisited at a later date A barebones exploration of the use of hatch, in the use for development of a simple Python application. Using this post as a form of reference or self-help link for python project set-up. Or, you can skip the step-by-step tedious explanation by jumping to the full pyproject.
